item.title: Security Vulnerability Solutions for Non-Tech People | In Simple Language
item.description: In the world of data, the Security of personal data is the biggest concern of anyone. Knowingly or unknowingly we share a lot of data to the company like Google and Facebook. In the old era, we have made walls/doors to protect our property from external threats. So now how far you will go to protect you and your beloved property.

item.title: Building and Testing A TypeScript library
item.description: Building and Testing A TypeScript/NodeJS library without WebPack, Jest or Rollup

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome to my blog! This is my first blog in this platform.
